seo.homeTitle: Crumbs O' Bliss | Artisan Pizza & Cake Bakery in West Bengal
seo.homeDescription: Experience the magic of artisanal pizzas, custom cakes, and fresh baked goods in Cheora, West Bengal. Let's bliss together with Crumbs O' Bliss!
seo.aboutTitle: About Crumbs O' Bliss | Artisan Bakery
seo.aboutDescription: Learn about Crumbs O' Bliss - your favorite artisan bakery specializing in fresh pizzas, custom cakes, and organic baked goods.
seo.itemsTitle: Our Menu | Pizzas & Cakes | Crumbs O' Bliss
seo.itemsDescription: Browse our delicious collection of artisanal pizzas and custom cakes. Fresh, honest, small-batch baked goods made with care.
seo.contactTitle: Contact Us | Crumbs O' Bliss Bakery
seo.contactDescription: Get in touch with Crumbs O' Bliss. Call us, email us, or visit our location near Neotia University in South 24 Parganas.

hero.title: Let's Bliss Together
hero.subtitle: Fresh, honest, small-batch baked goods made with time-tested techniques

items.title: Our Creations
items.description: Handcrafted with care, each item is a testament to our passion for baking

about.title: About Crumbs O' Bliss
about.description: Crumbs O' Bliss is an artisan bakery focused on fresh, honest, small-batch baked goods made with time-tested techniques and thoughtfully sourced ingredients. Baking is treated as both science and soul, balancing precision with warmth and care. Every item we create reflects our commitment to quality and our dedication to bringing joy through exceptional baked goods.
about.missionText: To create exceptional baked goods that celebrate the art and craft of traditional baking while building a warm community around the love of fresh, quality food.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.section1Text: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on Crumbs O' Bliss website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.
terms.section2Text: The materials on our website are provided on an 'as is' basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaim and negate all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
terms.section3Text: In no event shall Crumbs O' Bliss or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on the Crumbs O' Bliss website.

footer.description: Artisan bakery specializing in fresh, honest, small-batch baked goods

videoSection.title: Crafting Perfection
videoSection.quote: From the wood-fired oven to your plate, experience the art of baking.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.description: Taste the passion in every creation

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.deliveryAns: Yes, we deliver fresh baked goods within Shyamnagar and nearby areas.
faq.customOrdersAns: Absolutely! Contact us for personalized cakes and special occasion items.
faq.ingredientsAns: We use only premium, sourced ingredients with no artificial additives.
faq.preOrder: How do I place a pre-order?
faq.preOrderAns: Visit our website, select items, and order via WhatsApp for fast confirmation.
